function.name: heatMode-turnOn
function.description: This function is used to turn on the heating mode of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to turn on the heating mode.

heatingTemperature.description: The desired temperature for the heating mode.

predefinedHeatingTemperatureUnit.description: The unit of the heating temperature (e.g., Celsius, Fahrenheit).
